title: Small Town Vanish
story: In the small town of Everglade, a young woman named Amelia Jones vanished without a trace. Her disappearance has baffled the local authorities and shaken the tight-knit community to its core.

As rumors and wild theories began to spread, a group of amateur investigators took it upon themselves to unravel the mystery surrounding the vanishing of Amelia Jones. With each passing day, they unearthed more questions than answers, and the truth seemed to slip further from their grasp.

But as they delved deeper into the dark underbelly of Everglade, they stumbled upon shocking revelations that would change the town forever. The truth was more sinister than anyone had imagined, and the fate of Amelia Jones was entwined with the darkest secrets of the town.
prompt: A missing person poster with a reward for information

suspect.name: Thomas Black
suspect.alibi: Claimed to be out of town visiting a sick relative
suspect.confirmation: His alibi was confirmed by his neighbor, who saw him leave for the trip

witness.name: Evelyn White
witness.observation: Claimed to have seen Amelia Jones arguing with a man near the town's edge
witness.description: A middle-aged woman with a keen eye for detail

npcs.name: Sheriff Harris
npcs.dialogue: I've been a sheriff in these parts for over 20 years, and I've never seen anything like this

npcs.name: Rebecca Miller
npcs.dialogue: I overheard some strange whispers at the local diner about a secret cult meeting near the woods

clues.abandoned shack: Found belongings of Amelia Jones hidden in an abandoned shack on the outskirts of town
clues.cell phone records: Amelia's phone records showed suspicious calls to an unknown number in the days leading up to her disappearance
clues.surveillance footage: Surveillance cameras captured Amelia arguing with a mysterious figure near the town's edge
clues.cryptic letter: Received a cryptic letter claiming to know the truth behind Amelia's disappearance
